Class Mote

  • java.lang.Object
    • IotDomain.NetworkEntity

  • public class Mote
extends NetworkEntity
    A class representing the energy bound and moving motes in the network.

      • Mote

        @Raw
public Mote​(java.lang.Integer xPos,
            java.lang.Integer yPos,
            EnvironmentMap environment,
            java.lang.Integer transmissionPower,
            java.lang.Integer SF,
            java.lang.Integer transmissionPowerThreshold,
            double desiredPER)
        A constructor generating a node with a given x-coordinate, y-coordinate, environment, noise figure, spreading factor and transmitting power.
        Parameters:
        xPos - The x-coordinate of the node.
        yPos - The y-coordinate of the node.
        environment - The environment of the node.
        SF - The spreading factor of the node.
        transmissionPower - The transmitting power of the node.
        transmissionPowerThreshold - The threshold for discriminating different transmissions.
        desiredPER - The desired PER of the node.
